title: Rewrite
text: Rewrite $$tan\left(x\right) cos\left(x\right)$$ in terms of sin(x) and cos(x).

title: Rewrite
text: $$tan\left(x\right) cos\left(x\right)$$ in terms of sin(x) and cos(x) can be rewritten as $$\fracsin^c\left(x\right)os\left(x\right)} cos\left(x\right)$$. Write the simplified form of this.
